
######################################

######################################


#leader_trait_army_veteran #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_army_veteran = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_army_veteran
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer_3 = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_buccaneer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_politician #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_politician_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_politician = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_politician
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_politician       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_politician_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_politician
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    }
    allow = {

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes

        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_principled_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_principled }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_principled_2       
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_principled_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer_3 = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_trailblazer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3       
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc

    }
    allow = {

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes

        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3       
        }
    }

#leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_bully }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {

        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3       
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt

            remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3

        hidden_effect = {

            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes

}


#leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }

    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3       
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt

            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }

            }
            root.owner = {

            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus_3

    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus_3 }

        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_cartographer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }

    potential = {

            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_2 }
        }
    }

        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes

        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt

            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_consul_general }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_2       
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_2

        hidden_effect = {

                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }

            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3 }
        }
    }

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes

            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3       
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3

        hidden_effect = {

                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }

            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3 }

    }

            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3       
        }
    }

        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3 }
    }

                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_frontier_spirit }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_overseer_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_overseer_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_overseer_2 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_overseer_2 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_overseer_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_overseer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_overseer_2       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_overseer_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_overseer_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_overseer_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_reformer_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_reformer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_reformer_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_reformer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_reformer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_reformer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_shadow_broker_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_shadow_broker_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_shadow_broker_2 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_shadow_broker_2 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_shadow_broker_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_shadow_broker }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_shadow_broker_2       
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_shadow_broker_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_shadow_broker_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {

                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_diplo_weight }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_diplo_weight = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_diplo_weight
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_diplo_weight       
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_diplo_weight }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_diplo_weight
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }

        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes

        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes

            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_educator       
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_supreme_organizer = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_totalitarian #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_totalitarian_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_totalitarian = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_totalitarian
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_totalitarian_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
